scripts.test:env: echo "Testing environment loading..." && node -e "require('dotenv').config({path:'.env.local'}); console.log('OpenAI Key:', process.env.OPENAI_API_KEY ? 'Set' : 'Missing'); console.log('Datadog Token:', process.env.DATADOG_CLIENT_TOKEN ? 'Set' : 'Missing');"
